title: Squad  member Cori Bush faces Democratic primary putting a spotlight on Israel
message:
Bell has consistently maintained that Israel has the right to defend itself against Hamas and said he would be supportive of the U.S. ally if elected.
Bush accused Israel of an “ethnic cleansing campaign” as the country retaliated.
A group of 30 rabbis from the area endorsed Bell in the spring and accused Bush of antisemitism.
Bush confirmed the federal investigation but referred to the complaints as “baseless.”Both Bush and Bell argued that the race is about more than just the Middle East.
On Friday, Rep. Katherine Clark, a member of House Democratic leadership, traveled to Missouri to stump for Bush.
event_breakdown:
Bell: Local rabbis accused Katherine Clark of a publicity stunt.
Bush: A group of 30 rabbis from the area accused Bush of antisemitism
Bell: Local rabbis accused Katherine Clark of a publicity stunt
Bush: A group of 30 rabbis from the area accused Bush of antisemitism
